 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂפָם‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==moustache== (compare N Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rete***; on meaning and form see [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>408</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 73</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Mic.3.7|Mic 3:7]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפָמוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.25|2Sam 19:25]] — ***moustache:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׂה שׂ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.25|2Sam 19:25]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">μύστάξ</span>) i.e. trim it; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָטָה עַלשֿׂ‎</span> [[Mic.3.7|Mic 3:7]]; [[Ezek.24.17|Ezek 24:17]]; [[Ezek.24.22|Ezek 24:22]]; [[Lev.13.45|Lev 13:45]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עטה‎</span> **1**). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂפַּח‎</span> see III.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספח‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׂפָּח‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספח‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ִשׂפְמוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.30.28|1Sam 30:28]] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁפ‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂפן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספן‎</span>. I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂפק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂ֫פֶק‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספק‎</span>.
